text: It’s been over 100 days since Russia wrongfully invaded Ukraine. It’s time to end this. The United States should join our allies in providing #Ukraine with the tools they need to firmly defeat Vladimir Putin and his barbaric regime. https://t.co/ZLvChfUvPP

This horrific massacre is disturbingly one of countless atrocities committed by the Assad regime. We must shed light on this & hold these war criminals accountable. My letter w/ @RepBrendanBoyle calls on @POTUS to target sanctions on those responsible: https://t.co/e6jCSLN4EE. https://t.co/cUpZywRdVl

In our effort to bolster supply chains & spur innovation, we must keep my bill with ⁦@RepMalinowski⁩ that helps the US capitalize on welcoming highly-skilled Hong-Kongers. From both a policy & a practical standpoint, China’s loss should be our gain. https://t.co/ReOGr4JXl7

As a strong Second Amendment defender, I believe we have to be the ones putting forward reasonable solutions to gun violence. I'm focused on saving lives & I'm hopeful more of my colleagues will reach across the aisle to do the same. https://t.co/CXodjhlSnD https://t.co/DO4r81OoG8
